---
title: API Reference
---

Complete function and class documentation for ggsegpy.

## Visualization Functions

Core plotting functions for 2D and 3D brain visualization.

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [geom_brain](geom_brain.qmd) | 2D brain atlas layer for plotnine |
| [ggseg3d](ggseg3d.qmd) | 3D interactive brain visualization |

## Atlases

Built-in brain atlases that ship with ggsegpy.

| Function | Type | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| [dk](dk.qmd) | Cortical | Desikan-Killiany parcellation |
| [aseg](aseg.qmd) | Subcortical | FreeSurfer subcortical segmentation |
| [tracula](tracula.qmd) | Tracts | TRACULA white matter atlas |

## 3D Modifiers

Functions to modify 3D plots. All return the figure for chaining.

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [pan_camera](pan_camera.qmd) | Set camera position (R-style names) |
| [set_background](set_background.qmd) | Change background color |
| [add_glassbrain](add_glassbrain.qmd) | Add transparent brain context |
| [set_legend](set_legend.qmd) | Configure legend display |

## Data Handling

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [brain_join](brain_join.qmd) | Join user data with atlas geometry |

## Themes

Plotnine themes for brain plots.

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `theme_brain` | Clean theme with minimal axes |
| `theme_darkbrain` | Dark background theme |
| `theme_custombrain` | Customizable theme |
| `theme_brain_void` | No axes, background, or grid |

## Classes

| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| [BrainAtlas](BrainAtlas.qmd) | Base class for all atlases |
| `CorticalAtlas` | Cortical surface atlas |
| `SubcorticalAtlas` | Subcortical structure atlas |
| `TractAtlas` | White matter tract atlas |
